title: I like this guy already
author: VD
content_html:
Thus spake Zygmunt:

“We will be in the Minneapolis area forever. Look, I’m not changing that at all. We will do our best to make sure that we get the best venue and right location.”

He said he plans to use his real estate business acumen to move forward on a plan for a new stadium, preferably an outdoor venue that will re-establish a home field weather advantage.

I will, of course, oppose any and all plans to make the public buy the guy a stadium. But he doesn’t want to move the team to LA and he wants an outdoor stadium. That’s two big improvements over Red McCombs right there.
content_text:
Thus spake Zygmunt:
“We will be in the Minneapolis area forever. Look, I’m not changing that at all. We will do our best to make sure that we get the best venue and right location.”
He said he plans to use his real estate business acumen to move forward on a plan for a new stadium, preferably an outdoor venue that will re-establish a home field weather advantage.
I will, of course, oppose any and all plans to make the public buy the guy a stadium.  But he doesn’t want to move the team to LA and he wants an outdoor stadium.  That’s two big improvements over Red McCombs right there.
